item.title: Football clubs expenses
item.description: # Load the packages library(tidyverse) library(FactoMineR) library(factoextra) library(highcharter) library(ggthemes) library(lubridate) library(treemap) This kernel is under construction :) ! Reading and preparing the data fifa <- read_csv("data.csv") print(paste("The dataset contains", dim(fifa)[1], "observations and", dim(fifa)[2], "columns")) ## [1] "The dataset contains 18207 observations and 89 columns" Missing values With this said let’s check the consistency of the dataset by looking for missing values and understanding what each column stands for.
